testCase.name: Item Chip Rendering Should render item-chip with value
Renders Selected items Should render 1 selected item
Renders Selected items Should render template text when no items have been selected
Drop Down Rendering Starts with no selected items should render no items in the selected box
Drop Down Rendering Starts with selected items should render selected items in the selected box
Drop Down Rendering Title is rendered when specified
Drop Down Rendering Placeholder text defaults to 'No options have been selected.' when not specified
Drop Down Rendering Correct placeholder text is used when specified
Drop Down Interactions Clicking Selected values box opens dropdown menu
Drop Down Interactions Deselecting item from the selected values box removes it
Drop Down Interactions Deselecting item from the dropdown menu removes it from the selected values box
Drop Down Interactions Selecting item from the dropdown menu adds it to the selected values box
